item.name: BackupPC - Hosts with full age more than 1 week
BackupPC - Hosts with No backups (2 Days)
BackupPC - Hosts with No backups (3 Days)
BackupPC - Hosts with No backups (4 Days)
BackupPC - Hosts with No backups (5 Days)
BackupPC - BackupPC_nightly Process
item.key: system.run["ps waux | grep BackupPC_nightly | grep -v grep | wc -l"]

trigger_prototype.name: {#BACKUPHOST} has bad file in full backup
{#BACKUPHOST} has bad file in incremental backup
{#BACKUPHOST} has bad share in full backup
{#BACKUPHOST} has bad share in incremental backup
{#BACKUPHOST} has full backup older than {$BACKUPPC_FULL_AGE_MAX_DAYS:"{#BACKUPHOST}"} days
{#BACKUPHOST} has INCR backup older than {$BACKUPPC_INCR_AGE_MAX_DAYS:"{#BACKUPHOST}"} days
{#BACKUPHOST} has tar error in full backup
{#BACKUPHOST} has tar error in incremental backup

trigger.expression: {Template App BackupPC:backuppc.hosts_nobackup_2.str(NONE)}=0 and {Template App BackupPC:backuppc.hosts_nobackup_3.str(NONE)}<>0 and {Template App BackupPC:backuppc.hosts_nobackup_4.str(NONE)}<>0 and {Template App BackupPC:backuppc.hosts_nobackup_5.str(NONE)}<>0
trigger.name: BackupPC - Host without Backups (2 Days)
trigger.description: There are some hosts that have not been backed up in 2 Days, while this is not a problem it should be monitored.

trigger.name: BackupPC - Host without Backups (3 Days)
trigger.description: There are some hosts that have not been backed up in 3 Days, this should be checked soon.

trigger.name: BackupPC - Host without Backups (4 Days)
trigger.description: There are some hosts that have not been backed up in 4 Days, this should be checked immediately.

trigger.name: BackupPC - Host without Backups (5 Days)
trigger.description: There are some hosts that have not been backed up in 5 Days, this should be checked immediately.

trigger.name: BackupPC - Server not Running
trigger.description: The BackupPC process it not running, try restarting the service.

trigger.name: BackupPC - {HOSTNAME} have hosts with full backup older than 1 week
trigger.description: BackupPC has some hosts missing weekly full backup. Please take action to correct.
